articles.title: Jermell Charlo knocks out Brian Castano to claim undisputed crown
articles.description: Jermell Charlo knocked out Argentina's Brian Castano to become the first undisputed super welterweight champion in history on Saturday.
articles.content:
Jermell Charlo knocked out Argentina’s Brian Castano to become the first undisputed super welterweight champion in history on Saturday.
Charlo, who fought to a controversial draw against Castano last year, battered the South American into submission ... [3418 chars]

articles.content:
Jermell Charlo and Brian Castano will clash tonight and no one is more excited than the fans who attended their weigh-in.
The pair will compete for the undisputed super welterweight world titles in a highly-anticipated fight.

articles.title: Fifth European star looms for Leinster after near-flawless display against Toulouse
articles.description: I can remember growing up and watching Germany dismantle teams like Brazil and Argentina which, on paper, looked more talented. So the worry walking into the Aviva Stadium was that a talented Leinster team was facing a side with incredible power, and that X-factor.

articles.title: ‘Paulo Londra: Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 23’ Tops Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: “Paulo Londra: BZRP Music Sessions, Vol. 23” by Paulo Londra and Bizarrap tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a second week.
articles.content: “Paulo Londra: BZRP Music Sessions, Vol. 23” by Paulo Londra and Bizarrap tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a second week. It’s the second music session by Bizarrap to lead for at least two weeks or more, trailing only “BZRP Music Sessio... [897 chars]

articles.title: MCG ‘Superclasico’ cancelled following Argentina’s withdrawal
articles.description: MCG blockbuster canned as Argentina ’not prepared to travel to Australia’
articles.content:
The “Superclasico” between South American giants Brazil and Argentina that was scheduled to be played at the MCG on June 11 has been called off.
A full house had been expected at the MCG for the match, but it will no longer go ahead following Argenti... [1157 chars]

articles.title: Victorian sports minister ‘p****d off’ as Argentina cancels MCG Superclasico
articles.description: Martin Pakula says Argentina ‘owe Australian football fans an explanation’ after 60,000 tickets were already sold for the June match.
articles.content:
Brazil’s glamour football friendly international against Argentina, scheduled for Melbourne next month, has been cancelled.

articles.title: Brazil friendly game vs. Argentina canceled; Jesus recalled
articles.description: SAO PAULO (AP) — Brazil’s friendly match against rival Argentina scheduled for June in Australia has been canceled.
articles.content:
SAO PAULO (AP) — Brazil’s friendly match against rival Argentina scheduled for June in Australia has been canceled.
The game was planned as part of Brazil’s preparations for the World Cup, but Brazilian soccer confederation coordinator Juninho Paulis... [1927 chars]
